title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 860.34 - Water uses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 860.34 - Water uses

State Regulations
(a) The quality
of ground water shall be maintained in a safe and satisfactory condition, except where such uses are precluded by natural quality, for use as: (1)
domestic, agricultural, industrial and
public water supplies; and
(2)
a
source of surface water suitable for recreation, wildlife, fish and other
aquatic life. (b) Other
uses may be designated by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
860.34

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
